events.name: Electrification of the Vehicle Industry
events.wd_description: Transitioning to electric vehicles (EVs) with a focus on production adaptation and achieving a break-even point in production costs compared to traditional vehicles.
events.description: Transitioning to electric vehicles (EVs) with a focus on production adaptation and achieving a break-even point in production costs compared to traditional vehicles.

events.name: EV Production Adaptation
events.wd_description: Adapting production to new technological solutions for electric vehicles.
events.description: Adapting production to new technological solutions for electric vehicles.

events.name: Infrastructure Development
events.wd_description: Developing infrastructure for the production of electric vehicles in major Asian countries, including Indonesia.
events.description: Developing infrastructure for the production of electric vehicles in major Asian countries, including Indonesia.

events.name: Resource Utilization
events.wd_description: Utilizing resources for EV production, including raw materials and minerals.
events.description: Utilizing resources for EV production, including raw materials and minerals.

events.name: Break-even Point Achievement
events.wd_description: Achieving a break-even point in production costs for electric vehicles compared to traditional vehicles.
events.description: Achieving a break-even point in production costs for electric vehicles compared to traditional vehicles.

events.name: Global EV Market Growth
events.wd_description: Growth of the global electric vehicle market, with an emphasis on competitive advantage and investment.
events.description: Growth of the global electric vehicle market, with an emphasis on competitive advantage and investment.

events.name: Market Expansion
events.wd_description: Expansion of the electric vehicle market in various countries, including Indonesia.
events.description: Expansion of the electric vehicle market in various countries, including Indonesia.

events.name: Competitive Advantage
events.wd_description: Building a competitive advantage in the EV market through resource richness and strategic location.
events.description: Building a competitive advantage in the EV market through resource richness and strategic location.

events.name: Indonesia’s Role in the EV Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_label: Indonesia’s Role in the EV Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: Indonesia's strategic position and actions to become a key player in the EV battery supply chain.
events.description: Indonesia's strategic position and actions to become a key player in the EV battery supply chain.

events.name: Resource Exploitation
events.wd_description: Exploitation of Indonesia's rich mineral resources for EV battery production.
events.description: Exploitation of Indonesia's rich mineral resources for EV battery production.

events.name: Nikel Ore Export Ban
events.wd_description: Ban on the export of unprocessed nickel ore to improve value-added opportunities and support local industry.
events.description: Ban on the export of unprocessed nickel ore to improve value-added opportunities and support local industry.

events.name: Class 2 Nickel Production
events.wd_description: Increase in Class 2 nickel production for stainless steel and battery-grade nickel.
events.description: Increase in Class 2 nickel production for stainless steel and battery-grade nickel.

events.name: Strategic Investments
events.wd_description: Strategic investments in the mineral industry to build competitive advantage and develop the EV battery supply chain.
events.description: Strategic investments in the mineral industry to build competitive advantage and develop the EV battery supply chain.

events.name: Chinese Investments
events.wd_description: Investments by major Chinese companies in the Indonesian mineral industry.
events.description: Investments by major Chinese companies in the Indonesian mineral industry.

events.name: Forming Partnerships
events.wd_description: Forming partnerships with foreign direct investments to enhance the EV battery supply chain.
events.description: Forming partnerships with foreign direct investments to enhance the EV battery supply chain.

events.name: Mutual Beneficial Relations
events.wd_description: Establishing mutually beneficial relations between Indonesia and investing countries.
events.description: Establishing mutually beneficial relations between Indonesia and investing countries.

events.name: Investment Growth
events.wd_description: Growing investments from various countries to build Indonesia's EV battery supply chain.
events.description: Growing investments from various countries to build Indonesia's EV battery supply chain.

events.name: Technological Solutions Adaptation
events.description: Adapting production to new technological solutions is essential for the electrification of the vehicle industry.

events.name: Government Support
events.description: Government policies and decrees, such as those by the Indonesian President, support the electric vehicle industry.

events.name: Investment in Lithium ion Battery Production
events.description: Ensuring significant investment in lithium-ion battery production is crucial for completing a downstream supply chain.

events.name: FDI Importance
events.description: Foreign Direct Investment (FDI) is vital for inflowing resources and technologies necessary for Indonesia to become a key hub for EV batteries.

events.name: Mutual Relations
events.description: Ensuring a proper level of mutual relations with foreign investors, particularly China, to maintain a balanced partnership.

events.name: Class 1 Nickel Production
events.description: Transforming Class 2 laterite deposits into battery-grade Class 1 nickel for ion-lithium battery production.

events.name: Environmental Concerns
events.description: Implementing low-carbon manufacturing technology to address environmental concerns associated with EV production.

events.name: Employment Growth
events.description: Development of the EV industry can increase employment rates without affecting the internal combustion powertrain industry.
